item.title: (no title)
item.content:encoded: i noticed this hasn't been updated with newer themes like Hikari or The Calling. then again they are overworld themes so they don't fit into the first three categories. hope to see this page updated soon. i would do it myself however, i don't know enough about editing pages to do it myself.

item.title: (no title)
item.content:encoded: The "reason" that Warstruck isn't available immediately stems from it's original use, where it wasn't useful at all until season 2. This was because Warstruck used to grant a currency called N which was part of the Ninja World War system which has since been converted to the arena. Originally to get the letter of Marque you were required to have purchased every possible item for season 1 and N didn't loop. Ergo it was worthless until season 2.

item.title: (no title)
item.content:encoded: Almost all themes, Warstruck included, require you to loop to unlock them. Very few themes unlock immediately. I believe that at current the only unlock immediately themes that you can access in season 1 are 28 Dayrolls Later and Floating on Air.

item.title: (no title)
item.content:encoded: Hmm, I wonder, cause there's some that specifically say you can get them in season 1, like 28DL, but most of the ones require season 2 cause you have to either do content like r00t that requires season 2, or you have to loop under certain conditions, etc. But I see no specific reason for Warstruck to be season 2+, other than to just be annoyingâ€¦

item.title: (no title)
item.content:encoded: from what I remember most themes require you to loop to get them. I believe warstruck is such a theme.

item.title: (no title)
item.content:encoded: Hmm, I already have the letter of marque, how come I can't set the Warstruck theme? I mean, 28 Dayrolls Later is available in season 1, why not this one?
